requirements_prior_to_hiring: Current criminal record check including vulnerable sector (within last 6 months)
Current Alberta Intervention Record check (within last 12 months)

organization_overview.about: Enviros is a social services agency providing individualized programs to children, youth, adults, and families in vulnerable situations. Founded in 1976, it has been an adopter of evidence-based best practices.
organization_overview.vision: The Power of Human Relationships Invites Belonging and Inspires Growth
organization_overview.program_focus: Enviros Foster Care program provides care to children under 18 during times of upheaval, matching foster homes to children’s needs with a focus on returning them to family or permanent placements.

screening_questions: Do you have a valid criminal record check within the last 6 months?
Do you have an Alberta Intervention Record check within the last 12 months?
Do you have 5+ years of administrative/IT experience?

overview.education: College, CEGEP or non-university certificate or diploma (1–2 years) or equivalent experience

responsibilities: Keep financial records and establish, maintain and balance various accounts using manual and computerized bookkeeping systems
Prepare statistical, financial and accounting reports
Carry out administrative activities of the establishment
Review and evaluate new administrative procedures
Oversee and coordinate office administrative procedures
Establish work priorities and ensure deadlines are met
Coordinate and plan office services such as accommodation, relocation, equipment, supplies, forms, asset disposal, parking, maintenance and security
Assemble data and prepare periodic/special reports, manuals and correspondence

screening_questions: Do you have experience with Windows and Microsoft Office applications?
Do you have a College diploma or equivalent experience?
Do you have at least 2 years of bookkeeping/administrative experience?
Are you legally eligible to work in Canada?
